function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of response to preventing virus propagation (PVP2) in the Health & Safety category","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Implement measures to prevent virus propagation, such as ventilation and air purification","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV disinfection, ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Missed responses to mental health (MH2 and MH3) in the Health & Safety category","Impact":"Heightened risk of mental health issues among building occupants","Mitigation":"Implement mental health support programs and facilities in the built environment","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, designated relaxation areas, access to mental health professionals","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Human resources, building managers"},{"Description":"Lack of response to wastewater management (WWM1, WWM2, WWM3) in the Health & Safety category","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne disease transmission and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Implement effective wastewater management systems and treatment processes","Technologies":"Water treatment plants, wastewater recycling systems, proper sanitation infrastructure","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Facility managers, environmental engineers"}]}
